body:
Reported by jazevec:

Welkin Tern (1U 2/1 flyer with "can only block creatures with flying") actually *can* block creatures without flying. I was attacked by Ardent Recruit early in the game and could block it. I tried doing that and they actually dealt damage to each other. I learned to never, ever, under no circumstances to move my eyes away from lower left corner of the screen and I'm pretty sure no spells or effects were involved.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: creatures with "can only block creatures with flying" *can* block creatures without flying

comments.body: I tried some test games and there the "can only block creatures with flying" worked as expected.
